text: And to the people of Thamûd We sent their brother Ṣâliḥ. He said, “O my people! Worship God. You have no god other than Him. He ˹is the One Who˺ produced you from the earth and settled you on it. So seek His forgiveness and turn to Him in repentance. Surely my Lord is Ever Near, All-Responsive ˹to prayers˺.”
